title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre long on vision and imagination, but short on data and details now. An adventurous pursuit for excellence starts with selling yourself a story. Of course, you can land in hot water if you weave tales that are light on the facts. Lean into dreamy Neptunes opposition to meticulous Mercury to fantasize about your ideal future. Turning your thoughts into reality begins by daring to conceive a master plan. Once you have a blueprint in mind, the cosmos will step in to help you fulfill your dreams. Author Bruce Black wrote, Setting your intention is like drawing an arrow from the quiver of your heart. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
